description.zh-CN: 一个toast通知组件，用于向用户显示简短的非侵入式消息，支持自动消失。支持多种通知类型、自动消失功能、自定义操作和堆叠行为，实现有效的用户通信和反馈。
description.en-US: A toast notification component for displaying brief, non-intrusive messages to users with automatic dismissal. Supports multiple notification types, auto-dismissal functionality, custom actions, and stacking behavior for effective user communication and feedback.

description.zh-CN: 精致的toast通知实现，具有清晰的消息、流畅的动画和适当的视觉层级。提供有效的临时通知，具有良好的可见性和最小的内容干扰。
description.en-US: A polished toast notification implementation with clear messaging, smooth animations, appropriate visual hierarchy, and responsive positioning. Provides effective temporary notifications with good visibility, minimal content disruption, and helpful visual feedback.

description.zh-CN: Material Design风格的Toast 通知实现
description.en-US: Toast Notifications implementation in Material Design style

description.zh-CN: 玻璃拟态风格的Toast 通知实现
description.en-US: Toast Notifications implementation in Glassmorphism style

description.zh-CN: 拟态风格风格的Toast 通知实现
description.en-US: Toast Notifications implementation in Neumorphism style
Toast Notifications implementation in Bootstrap style
